summary:
Project Controls Manager with 7+ years of experience in Oil Refineries, Retail Fuel Networks and Airport projects. Have strong capabilities in Project Planning, Cost Control, Process Optimization, Resource Coordination and Strategy Development. Have worked in projects ranging from $3million-$5.5 billion. Founded one of the pioneering e-commerce businesses as a teenager. Acquired a Master degree in Energy Systems with excellent academic records.

And what keeps me going? 
‘Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.’ - Thomas A. Edison
